attributes.additional_details: Since the last election the deficit has trebled, and public funds have been use to provide unjustifiable pay rises excessively greater than public and private sector awards and unnecessary job creation of positions such consultant and personal aides or advisors with unrealistic salaries.
attributes.background: The Government has misled The House and Electorates by repeatedly stating and guaranteeing that it's policies, strategy and strong leadership, could and would control, reduce spending and the countries deficit.
